PIE √bhrūğ- ‘to collect, pluck (especially fruit)’ (a scarcely attested root) IEW 173 bhrūğ-12 ‘Frucht, genießen, gebrauchen’
Hurrian pugl- ‘(?) to gather, collect, pluck’ (< *bhrūğ-) 𓍁
With cluster simplication in Hurrian (β < *bhr-)
